related_post.text: `{'gold chest': {'mora': 0 gems': 0'} silver chest': {'mora': 0 gems': 1'}}` how can i get the name of the chest the mora and the gems out of this dictionary?

so_post.text: it's honestly probably easier to just manipulate it as JSON instead of dealing with nested dicts check out https://stackoverflow.com/questions/51788550/parsingjsonnesteddictionaryusingpython and you can probably find some useful stuff @moanie

comments: Davinci gets answer about manipulating JSON then dealing with nested dict
